welcomeMessage: Hello! I am Marlon Fernando Ruiz Palacios, a software engineering student. This is my portfolio, where I share my learning journey and my featured projects. Explore my work and learn more about me and my passion for software engineering! Thanks for visiting!
newContentDescription: This is new content added below the portfolio.
skill1: Visual Studio Code expert, with advanced programming, navigation and problem-solving skills.
skill2: MySQL expert, with extensive experience in database design, efficient queries and performance optimization.
skill3: CSS expert, with solid experience in web design, advanced styling and creating attractive and responsive interfaces.
